headline: Makers of the HERDEZ® Brand Announce Newest Addition to Mexican Refrigerated Entrées Portfolio
summary: The makers of the HERDEZ® brand are expanding their HERDEZ® Mexican Refrigerated Entrées line with the addition of a classic pork dish celebrated for its bold, savory flavor: Al Pastor. The all-new HERDEZ® Al Pastor Seasoned Shredded Pork with Sauce, featuring tender, seasoned shredded pork simmered in a rich, flavorful sauce, brings delectable notes to every bite — with limited prep required.

content.title: Makers of the HERDEZ® Brand Announce Newest Addition to Mexican Refrigerated Entrées Portfolio

The all-new HERDEZ® Al Pastor Seasoned Shredded Pork with Sauce, featuring tender, seasoned shredded pork simmered in a rich, flavorful sauce, brings delectable notes to every bite — with limited prep required.

thumbnail.caption: HERDEZ® Al Pastor Seasoned Shredded Pork with Sauce offers a delicious blend of bold spices.
